text: Men's water polo at the 2015 Summer Universiade was held in Yeomju Indoor Aquatics Center, Gwangju, Korea from 2–14 July 2015. ==Squads== ==Results== All times are Korea Standard Time (UTC+09:00) ===Preliminary round=== ====Group A==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;
